messages.subject: Insearch of information.
messages.msgSnippet: I am looking for any information dealing with the samurai warrior known as sakazumi Mozuo last name firt here, and the long Katana he used which was fordged
messages.messageBody:
I am looking for any information dealing with the samurai warrior
known as "sakazumi Mozuo" last name firt here, and the long Katana he
used which was fordged around 1750AD.
If you know where I can research and find out about him, and his
history that would also be great.

Thank You

Riku
